'''0.0.14a_07'''<ref>https://www.deviantart.com/thewafer/art/Minecraft-Water-Lava-Spiral-128137542</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on May 28, 2009, at 18:31 UTC to finally fix mouse movement code.<ref name="_07">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''(20:31:18) <@notch> mezo: _07 is up now.. does it work NOW?''", "''(20:31:52) <mezo> IT IS FIXED''" [...] "''(20:32:25) <mezo> it's not coming loose at all either''" (18:31 to 18:32 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Finally fixed mouse movement code.<ref name="_07"/>
